title: CU Anschutz Newsroom
author: Debra Melani; August
cleaned_text: COVID-19 cases have continued a steady uptick that began over the summer in Colorado and across the nation, already contributing to school closures in some harder-hit Southern states. Meanwhile, with respiratory season fast approaching and a brand-new, highly mutated variant raising eyebrows, doctors are fielding questions about a yet-to-be released booster shot. CU Anschutz Fitzsimons Building
